Krefeld.title: Krefeld
Krefeld.byline: Krefeld is a city on the Lower Rhine in North Rhine-Westphalia with 234,000 inhabitants.

Krems.title: Krems
Krems.byline: Krems an der Donau is a riverside town in the Danube's Wachau Valley tourist region of Lower Austria.

Kremnica.title: Kremnica
Kremnica.byline: Kremnica is a town in the Tekov region of Western Slovakia.
